reviews.Subject: Computer Science
reviews.Review: Dr. Smith is an excellent professor! Her lectures are clear, and she is always available for extra help.

reviews.Subject: Mathematics
reviews.Review: Very knowledgeable and approachable. Sometimes the material is challenging, but he explains it well.

reviews.Subject: Physics
reviews.Review: Dr. Johnson knows her stuff, but her teaching style is a bit dry.

reviews.Subject: Chemistry
reviews.Review: The lectures are confusing and hard to follow. The exams are tough too.

reviews.Subject: Biology
reviews.Review: Great professor! She makes the content interesting and is very supportive.

reviews.Subject: History
reviews.Review: Dr. Wilson is a fantastic storyteller, making history come alive in his classes.

reviews.Subject: Philosophy
reviews.Review: Her lectures are thought-provoking, but sometimes hard to grasp without prior knowledge.

reviews.Subject: Economics
reviews.Review: Very informative and clear. He ties concepts to real-world scenarios effectively.

reviews.Subject: Literature
reviews.Review: The reading load is heavy, and her feedback on essays can be vague.

reviews.Subject: Psychology
reviews.Review: Dr. Jackson is amazing! His classes are engaging, and he truly cares about his students.

reviews.Subject: Sociology
reviews.Review: The lectures are okay, but the grading is tough.

reviews.Subject: Political Science
reviews.Review: Dr. Lewis is passionate about the subject and encourages critical thinking.

reviews.Subject: Art History
reviews.Review: Her passion for art is contagious. The classes are enjoyable and educational.

reviews.Subject: Engineering
reviews.Review: The material is hard, and his teaching style isn't very engaging.

reviews.Subject: Nursing
reviews.Review: Dr. Young is very supportive and knowledgeable. She prepares students well for the field.

reviews.Subject: Business Administration
reviews.Review: His classes are well-organized, and he provides real-world examples.

reviews.Subject: Anthropology
reviews.Review: Interesting material, but the lectures can be dry at times.

reviews.Subject: Music
reviews.Review: Dr. Scott is a phenomenal musician and teacher. His passion for music is inspiring.

reviews.Subject: Environmental Science
reviews.Review: Her classes are informative and she encourages active participation.

reviews.Subject: Law
reviews.Review: The material is dense, and his lectures are difficult to follow.
